title: BASF 's planned capital expenditure by region 2020 to 2024
summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of capital expenditure in the y axis.
The Share of capital expenditure is appeared to be the highest at Region Asia Pacific and lowest at Region South America Africa Middle East.
The Share of capital expenditure of Region Asia Pacific is 41.0% larger than the minimum value at South America Africa Middle East.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of capital expenditure for 5 number of Regions.
Region Asia Pacific has the highest Share of capital expenditure and South America Africa Middle East has the lowest Share of capital expenditure.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of capital expenditure in the y axis.
The Share of capital expenditure is appeared to be the highest at Region Asia Pacific and lowest at Region South America Africa Middle East.
The Share of capital expenditure of Region Asia Pacific is 41.0% larger than the minimum value at South America Africa Middle East.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of capital expenditure in the y axis.
Region Asia Pacific has the highest Share of capital expenditure and South America Africa Middle East has the lowest Share of capital expenditure.
Region Europe has the second highest value for Share of capital expenditure.
The highest Region Asia Pacific has 40.0 more Share of capital expenditure than the lowest Region South America Africa Middle East.
The Region Asia Pacific has the highest Share of capital expenditure, followed by Europe, and North America. Down to the Region South America Africa Middle East which is the lowest.
Considered together, the average Share of capital expenditure in all 5 Regions is roughly 20.0.
The Share of capital expenditure is 100.0 if we add up values of all Regions.
